title: Rope font without the texture
content: I have an image in my head of a rope like font but without the rope texture, just the flow of the lines. It's just that I can't find any font that resembles this image. If you have suggestions I would be happy to hear them. Thank you
author: P_P

comments.content: Nice and close but a bit to wild for the task. Thank you for the sugggestion Renko.
Searched the site for giddyup and found som alternatives but no real match.

There is Daniel Pelavin's Kulukundis:

[http://www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.htm?pid=204787](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102959/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.htm?pid=204787 "http://www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.htm?pid=204787")

Also, you might want to contact Danny directly as he may have some more "rope-like" things in the works

[http://www.pelavin.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102959/http:/www.pelavin.com/ "http://www.pelavin.com")
Thank you for your suggestions. I have chosen to try Montessori, not precisely what I was looking for but it's easy to read.
